Margins apply to top, bottom, left, right, and fill anchors. The anchors.margins property can be used to set all of the various margins at once, to the same value. It will not override a specific margin that has been previously set; to clear an explicit margin set its value to undefined. Note that margins are anchor-specific and are not applied if an item does not use anchors.

Media controls provide an interface to individual features provided by a media service. Most services implement a principal control which exposes the core functionality of the service and a number of optional controls which expose any additional functionality.
trans-unit.target: 媒体控件为媒体服务所提供的各个功能提供了一个接口。大多数服务都实现了一个主控件,它暴露了服务的核心功能,以及一些可选控件,暴露了任何附加功能。

trans-unit.source: Media made available by a remote services can often be available in multiple encodings or quality levels, this allows a client to select an appropriate resource based on considerations such as codecs supported, network bandwidth, and display constraints. QMediaResource includes information such as the MIME type, audio and video codecs, audio and video bit rates, and resolution so these constraints and others can be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 远程服务提供的媒体通常可以多种编码或质量级别提供，这使客户端可以根据考虑因素（例如，支持的编解码器，网络带宽和显示限制）选择适当的资源。QMediaResource包含诸如MIME类型，音频和视频编解码器，音频和视频比特率以及分辨率等信息，因此可以评估这些约束和其他约束。

trans-unit.source: Media made available by a remote services can often be available in multiple encodings or quality levels, this allows a client to select an appropriate resource based on considerations such as codecs supported, network bandwidth, and display constraints. QMediaResource includes information such as the MIME type, audio and video codecs, audio and video bit rates, and resolution so these constraints and others can be evaluated.

Media objects can use services loaded dynamically from plug-ins or implemented statically within an applications. Plug-in based services should also implement the QMediaServiceProviderPlugin interface. Static services should implement the QMediaServiceProvider interface. In general, implementing a QMediaService is outside of the scope of this documentation and support on the relevant mailing lists or IRC channels should be sought.
trans-unit.target: 媒体对象可以使用从插件动态加载的服务或在应用程序中静态实现的服务。基于插件的服务还应该实现QMediaServiceProviderPlugin接口。静态服务应实现QMediaServiceProvider接口。通常，实现QMediaService不在本文档的范围之内，应寻求有关邮件列表或IRC频道的支持。

trans-unit.source: Media objects can use services loaded dynamically from plug-ins or implemented statically within an applications. Plug-in based services should also implement the QMediaServiceProviderPlugin interface. Static services should implement the QMediaServiceProvider interface. In general, implementing a QMediaService is outside of the scope of this documentation and support on the relevant mailing lists or IRC channels should be sought.
Media services provide implementations of the functionality promised by media objects, and allow multiple providers to implement a QMediaObject.
trans-unit.target: 媒体服务提供媒体对象承诺的功能的实现，并允许多个提供者实现QMediaObject。

trans-unit.source: MenuBar can be added to an ApplicationWindow, providing menu options to access additional functionality of the application.
MenuBar consists of drop-down menus, and is normally located at the top edge of the window.
MenuBar is currently available on the following platforms:

MenuBarItem is used as a default delegate type for MenuBar. Notice that it is not necessary to declare MenuBarItem instances by hand when using MenuBar. It is sufficient to declare Menu instances as children of the MenuBar and the respective items are created automatically.
MenuBarItem presents a Menu within a MenuBar. The respective drop-down menu is shown when a MenuBarItem is triggered via keyboard, mouse, or touch.
MenuItem inherits its API from AbstractButton. For instance, you can set text and icon using the AbstractButton API.
MenuItem is a convenience type that implements the AbstractButton API, providing a familiar way to respond to menu items being triggered, for example.
MenuItem provides an item to add in a menu or a menu bar. More...

MenuItemGroup is exclusive by default. In an exclusive menu item group, only one item can be checked at any time; checking another item automatically unchecks the previously checked one. MenuItemGroup can be configured as non-exclusive, which is particularly useful for showing, hiding, enabling and disabling items together as a group.
MenuSeparator is used to visually distinguish between groups of items in a menu by separating them with a line.
MenuSeparator provides a separator for items inside a menu. More...
Menus are added to the menu bar by modifying the Type Here placeholders. One of these is always present for editing purposes, and will not be displayed in the preview or in the finished window.

trans-unit.source: Menus can also be rearranged in the menu bar simply by dragging and dropping them in the preferred location. A vertical red line indicates the position where the menu will be inserted.

trans-unit.source: Menus can contain any number of entries and separators, and can be nested to the required depth. Adding new entries to menus can be achieved by navigating the menu structure in the usual way.
trans-unit.target: 菜单可以包含任意数量的条目和分隔符,并且可以嵌套到所需的深度。在菜单中添加新条目可以通过以通常的方式浏览菜单结构来实现。

trans-unit.source: Menus in Qt are implemented in QMenu. The QMenu keeps a list of actions, which it draws as menu items. When QMenu receives paint events, it calculates the size of each menu item and draws them individually with CE_MenuItem. Menu items do not have a separate element for their label (contents), so all drawing is done in CE_MenuItem. The menu also draws the frame of the menu with PE_FrameMenu. It also draws CE_MenuScroller if the style supports scrolling. CE_MenuTearOff is drawn if the menu is too large for its bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Qt中的菜单在QMenu中实现。该QMenu保持的动作列表，它汲取营养菜单项。当QMenu接收绘制事件时，它将计算每个菜单项的大小，并使用 CE_MenuItem 分别绘制它们。菜单项的标签（内容）没有单独的元素，因此所有绘制都在 CE_MenuItem 中完成。菜单还使用 PE_FrameMenu 绘制菜单的框架。如果样式支持滚动，则还将绘制 CE_MenuScroller 。如果菜单对于其边界矩形而言太大，则会绘制 CE_MenuTearOff 。

trans-unit.source: Message is purely informative and can safely be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 留言纯属告知,可以放心忽略。

trans-unit.source: Message-oriented sockets requesting a connection to a remote server. The peer hostname and peer port match the values passed to QSctpSocket::connectToHost(). The local port is usually -1, indicating the socket has no preference in which port should be used. The URL component is not used.
trans-unit.target: 面向消息的套接字，请求与远程服务器的连接。对等主机名和对等端口与传递给QSctpSocket :: connectToHost（）的值匹配。本地端口通常为-1，表示套接字没有优先使用哪个端口。未使用URL组件。

trans-unit.source: Messages can be passed between the new thread and the parent thread using sendMessage() and the onMessage() handler.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用sendMessage（）和 onMessage() 处理函数在新线程和父线程之间传递消息。

trans-unit.source: Messages can be passed between the new thread and the parent thread using sendMessage() and the onMessage() handler.

Messages from the OpenGL server are logged asynchronously. This means that messages can be logged some time after the corresponding OpenGL actions that caused them, and even be received in an out-of-order fashion, depending on the OpenGL implementation. This mode has a very low performance penalty, as OpenGL implementations are heavily threaded and asynchronous by nature.
trans-unit.target: 来自OpenGL服务器的消息是异步记录的。这意味着,消息可能会在导致这些消息的相应OpenGL操作之后一段时间才被记录,甚至会根据OpenGL实现的不同,以不按顺序的方式被接收。这种模式对性能的影响非常小,因为OpenGL实现的本质是重度线程和异步的。

trans-unit.source: Messages from the OpenGL server are logged synchronously and sequentially. This has a severe performance hit, as OpenGL implementations are very asynchronous by nature; but it's very useful to debug OpenGL problems, as OpenGL guarantees that the messages generated by a OpenGL command will be logged before the corresponding command execution has returned. Therefore, you can install a breakpoint on the messageLogged() signal and see in the backtrace which OpenGL command caused it; the only caveat is that if you are using OpenGL from multiple threads you may need to force direct connection when connecting to the messageLogged() signal.
trans-unit.target: 来自OpenGL服务器的消息被同步并顺序记录。这会严重影响性能，因为OpenGL实现本质上是非常异步的。但是调试OpenGL问题非常有用，因为OpenGL保证在返回相应的命令执行之前，将记录由OpenGL命令生成的消息。因此，您可以在messageLogged（）信号上安装一个断点，并在回溯中查看是哪个OpenGL命令引起了断点；唯一的警告是，如果您从多个线程使用OpenGL，则在连接到messageLogged（）信号时可能需要强制直接连接。

trans-unit.source: Metadata allows the virtual keyboard to inspect the plugin before loading the actual library. It also prevents the virtual keyboard from loading conflicting extension plugins, for example, two handwriting extensions.
trans-unit.target: 元数据允许虚拟键盘在加载实际库之前检查插件。它还可以防止虚拟键盘加载冲突的扩展插件,例如,两个手写扩展。

trans-unit.source: Metal via a graphics abstraction layer. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.

Method replies are generated automatically with the contents of the output parameters (if there were any) by the Qt D-Bus implementation. Slots need not worry about constructing proper QDBusMessage objects and sending them over the connection.
trans-unit.target: Qt D-Bus实现会自动使用输出参数的内容（如果有的话）生成方法答复。插槽不必担心构造适当的QDBusMessage对象并通过连接发送它们。

trans-unit.source: Methods (providing they are public slots or flagged with Q_INVOKABLE)
trans-unit.target: 方法（假设它们是公共插槽或带有Q_INVOKABLE标记）

trans-unit.source: Methods and properties for adjusting camera image processing parameters.
trans-unit.target: 调整相机图像处理参数的方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: Methods and properties for adjusting exposure (aperture, shutter speed etc).
trans-unit.target: 调整曝光的方法和性能(光圈、快门速度等)。

trans-unit.source: Methods and properties for adjusting focus and providing feedback on autofocus progress.
trans-unit.target: 调整焦点和提供自动对焦进度反馈的方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: Methods and properties for capturing movies.
trans-unit.target: 捕捉电影的方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: Methods and properties for capturing still images.
trans-unit.target: 捕捉静态图像的方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: Methods and properties for controlling the camera flash.
trans-unit.target: 控制相机闪光灯的方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: Methods can be added to a QML type in order to define standalone, reusable blocks of JavaScript code. These methods can be invoked either internally or by external objects.
trans-unit.target: 方法可以添加到QML类型中,以便定义独立的、可重复使用的JavaScript代码块。这些方法既可以在内部调用,也可以由外部对象调用。

trans-unit.source: Methods for accessing common desktop services
trans-unit.target: 访问共同桌面服务的方法

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Office applications are supported, but you need to register the controls as "Insertable" objects. Reimplement QAxFactory::registerClass to add this attribute to the COM class, or set the "Insertable" class info for your class to "yes" using the Q_CLASSINFO macro.
trans-unit.target: 支持Microsoft Office应用程序，但是您需要将控件注册为“ Insertable”对象。重新实现QAxFactory :: registerClass将此属性添加到COM类，或使用Q_CLASSINFO宏将您的类的“ Insertable ”类信息设置为“是” 。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows Font File Format (Windows FNT)
trans-unit.target: 微软视窗字体文件格式(Windows FNT)

trans-unit.source: Microsoft introduced a new design paradigm with the Windows 8 Modern UI. A core part of this new approach is Windows Runtime (WinRT) that supports development using different programming languages, such as C++/CX (component extensions), C# VB.NET, or JavaScript. The Qt port uses the C++ capabilities. While WinRT supports the component extensions internally, they are not used inside Qt and you do not need to use them. WinRT applications run in a sandboxed environment for security reasons and support different architectures, such as ARM and x86.
trans-unit.target: 微软通过Windows 8 Modern UI引入了新的设计范例。这种新方法的核心部分是Windows运行时（WinRT），它支持使用不同的编程语言进行开发，例如C ++ / CX（组件扩展），C＃VB.NET或JavaScript。 Qt端口使用C ++功能。尽管WinRT在内部支持组件扩展，但它们不在Qt内部使用，因此您无需使用它们。出于安全原因，WinRT应用程序在沙盒环境中运行，并支持不同的体系结构，例如ARM和x86。

trans-unit.source: Mind that replace() and removeLast() can be emulated by stashing all items and rebuilding the list using clear() and append(). Therefore, they are not required for the list to be manipulable. Furthermore, clear() can be emulated using removeLast().

Mind that QVariantList and QVariantMap properties of C++ types are stored as values and cannot be changed in place by QML code. You can only replace the whole map or list, but not manipulate its contents. The following code does not work if the property l is a QVariantList:

Mind that the enum values are stored as signed int in the meta object system. Registering enumerations with values outside the range of values valid for int will lead to overflows and potentially undefined behavior when accessing them through the meta object system. QML, for example, does access registered enumerations through the meta object system.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，枚举值作为带符号的 int 存储在元对象系统中。使用对 int 有效的值范围之外的值注册枚举将导致通过元对象系统访问它们时发生溢出和潜在的未定义行为。例如，QML通过元对象系统访问注册的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Minimize button on title bars (e.g., in QMdiSubWindow).
trans-unit.target: 最小化标题栏上的按钮（例如QMdiSubWindow中的按钮）。

trans-unit.source: Minimize the cost of the journey
Minimize the cost of the journey.
Minimize the length of the journey
Minimize the length of the journey.
Minimize the traveling time for the journey
trans-unit.target: 尽量减少旅途中的旅行时间

trans-unit.source: Minimize the traveling time for the journey.
trans-unit.target: 尽量减少旅途的旅行时间。

trans-unit.source: Minimum opacity of the material. Useful range is [0, 1]. Default is 0.5.
Mipmap filtering gives better visual quality when scaling down compared to smooth, but it may come at a performance cost (both when initializing the image and during rendering).
trans-unit.target: 与平滑相比,Mipmap滤波在缩小比例时可以获得更好的视觉质量,但它可能会带来性能代价(在初始化图像和渲染过程中)。

trans-unit.source: Mipmap generation is supported and handled transparently to the applications via a built-in compute shader. However, at the moment, this feature is experimental and only supports power-of-two images. Textures of other size will work too, but this involves a QImage-based scaling on the CPU first. Therefore, avoid enabling mipmapping for Non-Power-Of-Two (NPOT) images whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 支持Mipmap生成，并通过内置的计算着色器对应用程序进行透明处理。但是，此功能目前处于试验阶段，仅支持2幂幂图像。其他大小的纹理也可以使用，但这首先需要在CPU上进行基于QImage的缩放。因此，请尽可能避免对非二次幂（NPOT）图像启用mipmapping。

trans-unit.source: Mipmapped Image items are not placed in the global atlas and will not be batched.
trans-unit.target: Mipmapped Image项目不会被放置在全局图集中,也不会被批量处理。

trans-unit.source: Mipmapping increases rendering speed and reduces aliasing artifacts when the item is scaled down.
trans-unit.target: Mipmapping可以提高渲染速度,并在缩小项目时减少别名伪影。

trans-unit.source: Mipmapping stores the texture along with its pre-calculated lower resolution versions. Whenever the texture is being displayed at a smaller size, the rendering system automatically uses these low-resolution images (which combine many details into a single pixel) blending them into the result as needed.
Mirror the image horizontally and then rotate it 90 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 水平镜像图像,然后将其旋转90度。

trans-unit.source: Mirror the image vertically and then rotate it 90 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 垂直镜像图像,然后将其旋转90度。

trans-unit.source: Mirroring is enabled for an item by setting the enabled property to true. By default, this only affects the item itself; setting the childrenInherit property to true propagates the mirroring behavior to all child items as well. If the LayoutMirroring attached property has not been defined for an item, mirroring is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 通过将enabled属性设置为true，可以为项目启用镜像。默认情况下，这仅影响项目本身。将childrenInherit属性设置为true也会将镜像行为传播到所有子项。如果尚未为项目定义 LayoutMirroring 附加属性，则不会启用镜像。

trans-unit.source: Missing or deleted value, usually an error.
trans-unit.target: 丢失或删除的值,通常是一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Mixing 100 percent of cyan, magenta and yellow
trans-unit.target: 混合100%的青色、洋红色和黄色。

trans-unit.source: Mixing Scene Graph and the native graphics API
Mnemonics are supported by prefixing the shortcut letter with &. For instance, "\&File" will bind the Alt-F shortcut to the "File" menu. Note that not all platforms support mnemonics.
trans-unit.target: 通过用＆前缀快捷字母来支持助记符。例如， "\&File" 会将 Alt-F 快捷方式绑定到 "File" 菜单。请注意，并非所有平台都支持助记符。

trans-unit.source: Mnemonics are supported by prefixing the shortcut letter with &. For instance, "\&Open" will bind the Alt-O shortcut to the "Open" menu item. Note that not all platforms support mnemonics.
trans-unit.target: 通过用＆前缀快捷字母来支持助记符。例如， "\&Open" 会将 Alt-O 快捷方式绑定到 "Open" 菜单项。请注意，并非所有平台都支持助记符。

trans-unit.source: Modal dialog for informing the user or for asking the user a question and receiving an answer
trans-unit.target: 用于通知用户或向用户提出问题并得到答复的模式对话框。

trans-unit.source: Modal dialogs are often used in situations where a return value is required, e.g. to indicate whether the user pressed OK or Cancel. A dialog can be closed by calling the accept() or the reject() slots, and exec() will return Accepted or Rejected as appropriate. The exec() call returns the result of the dialog. The result is also available from result() if the dialog has not been destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 模态对话框通常用于需要返回值的情况，例如，指示用户是否按下OK或Cancel。可以通过调用accept（）或reject（）插槽关闭对话框，并且exec（）将根据情况返回 Accepted 或 Rejected 。该EXEC（）调用返回对话的结果。如果对话框尚未销毁，结果也可以从result（）中获得。

trans-unit.source: Modal popups often have a distinctive background dimming effect defined in Overlay.modal, and do not allow press or release events through to items beneath them. For example, if the user accidentally clicks outside of a popup, any item beneath that popup at the location of the click will not receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 模态弹出窗口通常具有Overlay.modal中定义的独特的背景调光效果，并且不允许按下或释放事件到达其下方的项目。例如，如果用户意外地在弹出窗口之外单击，则该弹出窗口下方单击位置处的任何项目都不会收到该事件。

trans-unit.source: Modal widgets are organized in a stack. This function returns the active modal widget at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: 模态部件被组织在一个堆栈中。这个函数返回堆栈顶部的活动模式部件。

trans-unit.source: Modal window are organized in a stack. This function returns the modal window at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: 模态窗口被组织在一个堆栈中。该函数返回堆栈顶部的模态窗口。

trans-unit.source: Modality does not mean that there are any blocking calls to wait for the dialog to be accepted or rejected: only that the user will be prevented from interacting with the parent window or the application windows until the dialog is dismissed.
trans-unit.target: 模式并不意味着有任何阻塞调用来等待对话框被接受或拒绝:只意味着用户将被阻止与父窗口或应用程序窗口交互,直到对话框被驳回。

trans-unit.source: Modality does not mean that there are any blocking calls to wait for the dialog to be accepted or rejected; it's only that the user will be prevented from interacting with the parent window and/or the application windows at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 模式化并不意味着有任何阻塞调用来等待对话框被接受或拒绝,只是会阻止用户同时与父窗口和/或应用程序窗口进行交互。

trans-unit.source: Modality does not mean that there are any blocking calls to wait for the dialog to be accepted or rejected; it's only that the user will be prevented from interacting with the parent window and/or the application windows at the same time. You probably need to write an onAccepted handler to actually load or save the chosen file.
trans-unit.target: 模态并不意味着有任何阻塞调用来等待对话框被接受或拒绝;它只是意味着用户将被阻止同时与父窗口和/或应用程序窗口交互。你可能需要写一个onAccepted处理程序来实际加载或保存所选文件。

trans-unit.source: Modality does not mean that there are any blocking calls to wait for the dialog to be accepted or rejected; it's only that the user will be prevented from interacting with the parent window and/or the application windows until the dialog is dismissed.
trans-unit.target: 模式并不意味着有任何阻塞调用来等待对话框被接受或拒绝,只是在对话框被驳回之前,用户将被阻止与父窗口和/或应用程序窗口进行交互。

trans-unit.source: Modbus TCP networks can have multiple servers. Servers are read/written by a client device represented by QModbusTcpClient.
trans-unit.target: Modbus TCP网络可以具有多个服务器。服务器由QModbusTcpClient代表的客户端设备读取/写入。

trans-unit.source: Modbus is a request/reply protocol that has one Modbus client in its network and may have many Modbus servers. Servers can control only their own internal states and clients can read and write data in them. Modbus is not restricted by the network type, in theory it can use any QIODevice. However, not every plugin supports all classes derived from QIODevice.
trans-unit.target: Modbus是一种请求/答复协议，其网络中具有一个Modbus客户端，并且可能具有许多Modbus服务器。服务器只能控制自己的内部状态，客户端可以在其中读取和写入数据。Modbus不受网络类型的限制，理论上它可以使用任何QIODevice。但是，并非每个插件都支持从QIODevice派生的所有类。

trans-unit.source: Modbus networks can have multiple Modbus servers. Modbus Servers are read/written by a Modbus client represented by QModbusClient. QModbusServer communicates with a Modbus backend, providing users with a convenient API.
trans-unit.target: Modbus网络可以具有多个Modbus服务器。Modbus服务器由QModbusClient代表的Modbus客户端读取/写入。QModbusServer与Modbus后端通信，为用户提供了便捷的API。

trans-unit.source: Modbus networks can have multiple Modbus servers. Modbus Servers are read/written by a Modbus client represented by QModbusClient. QModbusServer communicates with a Modbus backend, providing users with a convenient API.

ModeKey can be used in situations where a particular mode is switched "ON / OFF", and where the mode change does not require changing the keyboard layout. When this component is used, the displayText should remain the same regardless of the mode, because the keyboard style visualizes the status.
Model indexes are constructed by models at the request of other components, such as views and delegates.
trans-unit.target: 模型索引是由模型应其他组件(如视图和委托)的请求构建的。

trans-unit.source: Model indexes are used to access items in the model. The row, column, and parent model index are needed to specify the item.
trans-unit.target: 模型索引用于访问模型中的项目。需要行、列和父模型索引来指定项目。

trans-unit.source: Model indexes corresponding to items are obtained with the index() function, and item flags are obtained with flags(). Item data is read with the data() function and written with setData(). The number of rows (and number of items in the string list) can be found with the rowCount() function.
trans-unit.target: 与项目对应的模型索引是通过index（）函数获得的，项目标志是通过标志（）获得的。使用data（）函数读取项目数据，并使用setData（）写入项目数据。行数（以及字符串列表中的项目数）可以通过rowCount（）函数找到。

trans-unit.source: Model indexes give views and delegates information about the location of items provided by models in a way that is independent of any underlying data structures.
trans-unit.target: 模型索引以独立于任何底层数据结构的方式,为视图和委托人提供关于模型提供的项目位置的信息。

trans-unit.source: Model indexes refer to items in models, and contain all the information required to specify their locations in those models. Each index is located in a given row and column, and may have a parent index; use row(), column(), and parent() to obtain this information. Each top-level item in a model is represented by a model index that does not have a parent index - in this case, parent() will return an invalid model index, equivalent to an index constructed with the zero argument form of the QModelIndex() constructor.
trans-unit.target: 模型索引是指模型中的项目，并包含在这些模型中指定其位置所需的所有信息。每个索引位于给定的行和列中，并且可以具有父索引；使用row（），column（）和parent（）来获取此信息。模型中的每个顶级项都由不具有父索引的模型索引表示-在这种情况下，parent（）将返回无效的模型索引，该索引等效于使用QModelIndex的零参数形式构造的索引（ ）的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Model indexes refer to items in models, and contain all the information required to specify their locations in those models. Each index is located in a given row and column, and may have a parent index; use row(), column(), and parent() to obtain this information. Each top-level item in a model is represented by a model index that does not have a parent index - in this case, parent() will return an invalid model index, equivalent to an index constructed with the zero argument form of the QModelIndex() constructor.

Model mappers allow the use of a QAbstractItemModel-derived model as a data source for a chart series, creating a connection between a QCandlestickSeries and the model object. A model mapper maintains an equal size across all QCandlestickSets.
trans-unit.target: 模型映射器允许使用QAbstractItemModel派生的模型作为图表系列的数据源，从而在QCandlestickSeries和模型对象之间创建连接。模型映射器在所有QCandlestickSets上保持相等的大小。

trans-unit.source: Model mappers enable using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and QAbstractBarSeries, so that each row in the data model defines a bar set and each column maps to a category in a bar series.
trans-unit.target: 使用模型映射器，可以使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。水平模型映射器用于在数据模型和QAbstractBarSeries之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一行都定义一个条形集，并且每一列都映射到一个条形系列中的类别。

trans-unit.source: Model mappers enable using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and QBoxPlotSeries object, so that each row in the data model defines a box-and-whiskers item and each column maps to the range and three median values of the box-and-whiskers item.
trans-unit.target: 使用模型映射器，可以使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。使用水平模型映射器在数据模型和QBoxPlotSeries对象之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一行都定义一个box-and-whiskers项目，并且每个列都映射到box-and的范围和三个中值-晶须项目。

trans-unit.source: Model mappers enable using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and QCandlestickSeries, so that each row in the data model defines a candlestick item and each column maps to the open, high, low, close, and timestamp values of the candlestick item.
trans-unit.target: 使用模型映射器，可以使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。水平模型映射器用于在数据模型和QCandlestickSeries之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一行都定义一个烛台项目，并且每一列都映射到该烛台项目的open，high，low，close和timestamp值。 。

trans-unit.source: Model mappers enable using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and CandlestickSeries, so that each row in the data model defines a candlestick item and each column maps to the open, high, low, close, and timestamp values of the candlestick item.
trans-unit.target: 使用模型映射器，可以使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。水平模型映射器用于在数据模型和CandlestickSeries之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一行都定义一个烛台项目，并且每一列都映射到该烛台项目的open，high，low，close和timestamp值。 。

trans-unit.source: Model mappers enable using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and PieSeries, so that each column in the data model defines a pie slice and each row maps to the label or the value of the pie slice.
trans-unit.target: 使用模型映射器，可以使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。水平模型映射器用于在数据模型和PieSeries之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一列都定义一个饼图切片，并且每一行都映射到标签或饼图切片的值。

trans-unit.source: Model mappers enable using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and QPieSeries, so that each column in the data model defines a pie slice and each row maps to the label or the value of the pie slice.
trans-unit.target: 使用模型映射器，可以使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。水平模型映射器用于在数据模型和QPieSeries之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一列都定义一个饼图切片，并且每一行都映射到标签或饼图切片的值。

trans-unit.source: Model mappers enable using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a line, spline, or scatter series and the data model that holds the consecutive data point coordinates on rows.
trans-unit.target: 使用模型映射器，可以使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。水平模型映射器用于在直线，样条曲线或散点图序列与保持行上连续数据点坐标的数据模型之间建立连接。

trans-unit.source: Model mappers enable using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A vertical model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and QAbstractBarSeries, so that each column in the data model defines a bar set and each row maps to a category in a bar series.
trans-unit.target: 使用模型映射器，可以使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。垂直模型映射器用于在数据模型和QAbstractBarSeries之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一列都定义一个条形集，并且每一行都映射到一个条形系列中的类别。

trans-unit.source: Model mappers enable using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A vertical model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and QCandlestickSeries, so that each column in the data model defines a candlestick item and each row maps to the open, high, low, close, and timestamp values of the candlestick item.
trans-unit.target: 使用模型映射器，可以使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。垂直模型映射器用于在数据模型和QCandlestickSeries之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一列都定义一个烛台项目，并且每一行都映射到该烛台项目的open，high，low，close和timestamp值。 。

trans-unit.source: Model subclasses need to provide implementations of many of the virtual functions defined in the QAbstractItemModel base class. The number of these functions that need to be implemented depends on the type of model - whether it supplies views with a simple list, a table, or a complex hierarchy of items. Models that inherit from QAbstractListModel and QAbstractTableModel can take advantage of the default implementations of functions provided by those classes. Models that expose items of data in tree-like structures must provide implementations for many of the virtual functions in QAbstractItemModel.
trans-unit.target: 模型子类需要提供QAbstractItemModel基类中定义的许多虚函数的实现。需要实现的这些功能的数量取决于模型的类型-它是否为视图提供简单的列表，表或复杂的项目层次结构。从QAbstractListModel和QAbstractTableModel继承的模型可以利用这些类提供的函数的默认实现。以树状结构显示数据项的模型必须为QAbstractItemModel中的许多虚函数提供实现。

trans-unit.source: Modern devices often support OpenGL ES 3.0 or 3.1 in addition to 2.0. To get a suitable OpenGL context, set the requested version via QSurfaceFormat::setVersion().

Modern devices often support OpenGL ES 3.0 or 3.1 in addition to 2.0. To get a suitable OpenGL context, set the requested version via QSurfaceFormat::setVersion(). Note however that the header files are only available in recent API levels, for example to include gl31.h, you need to target API level 21. Keep in mind also that using OpenGL ES 3.x features will result in the application breaking on older devices that only support 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 除了2.0之外，现代设备通常还支持OpenGL ES 3.0或3.1。要获得合适的OpenGL上下文，请通过QSurfaceFormat :: setVersion（）设置请求的版本。但是请注意，头文件仅在最近的API级别中可用，例如包括gl31.h，您需要定位到API级别21。还要记住，使用OpenGL ES 3.x功能将导致应用程序在较旧的版本上崩溃仅支持2.0的设备。

Most objects received from Java will be local references and will only stay valid in the scope you received them. After that, the object becomes eligible for garbage collection. If you want to keep a Java object alive you need to either create a new global reference to the object and release it when you are done, or construct a new QAndroidJniObject and let it manage the lifetime of the Java object.
trans-unit.target: 从Java收到的大多数对象将是本地引用，并且仅在收到它们的范围内保持有效。此后，该对象就可以进行垃圾回收了。如果要使Java对象保持活动状态，则需要创建对该对象的新全局引用并在完成后将其释放，或者构造一个新的QAndroidJniObject并让其管理Java对象的生存期。

trans-unit.source: Most objects received from Java will be local references and will only stay valid in the scope you received them. After that, the object becomes eligible for garbage collection. If you want to keep a Java object alive you need to either create a new global reference to the object and release it when you are done, or construct a new QAndroidJniObject and let it manage the lifetime of the Java object.

Most QCborArray functions accept an integer index rather than an iterator. For that reason, iterators are rarely useful in connection with QCborArray. One place where STL-style iterators do make sense is as arguments to generic algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 大多数QCborArray函数接受整数索引而不是迭代器。因此，迭代器在与QCborArray结合使用时很少有用。STL样式的迭代器确实有意义的地方之一是泛型算法的参数。

trans-unit.source: Most QJsonArray functions accept an integer index rather than an iterator. For that reason, iterators are rarely useful in connection with QJsonArray. One place where STL-style iterators do make sense is as arguments to generic algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 大多数QJsonArray函数接受整数索引而不是迭代器。因此，在与QJsonArray结合使用时，迭代器很少有用。STL样式的迭代器确实有意义的地方之一是泛型算法的参数。

trans-unit.source: Most QList functions accept an integer index rather than an iterator. For that reason, iterators are rarely useful in connection with QList. One place where STL-style iterators do make sense is as arguments to generic algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 大多数QList函数接受整数索引而不是迭代器。因此，迭代器在与QList结合使用时很少有用。STL样式的迭代器确实有意义的地方之一是泛型算法的参数。

trans-unit.source: Most DCC tools allow artists to freeze transformations, and we highly recommend performing this operation before importing mesh data into Qt Quick 3D. This operation ensures that the imported mesh has clean transformation data and no arbitrary transformation values, which can be confusing or an impediment to your work.
Most GUI styles use the pageStep() value to calculate the size of the slider.
trans-unit.target: 大多数GUI样式使用pageStep（）值来计算滑块的大小。

trans-unit.source: Most JavaScript files imported into a QML document are stateful implementations for the QML document importing them. In these cases, each instance of the QML object type defined in the document requires a separate copy of the JavaScript objects and state in order to behave correctly.
trans-unit.target: 大多数导入到QML文档中的JavaScript文件都是导入它们的QML文档的有状态实现。在这些情况下,文档中定义的QML对象类型的每个实例都需要一个单独的JavaScript对象和状态的副本才能正确地表现出来。

trans-unit.source: Most JavaScript programs do not intentionally modify the global object. However, JavaScript's automatic creation of undeclared variables is an implicit modification of the global object, and is prohibited in QML.
trans-unit.target: 大多数JavaScript程序不会故意修改全局对象。但是,JavaScript自动创建未声明的变量是对全局对象的隐性修改,在QML中是被禁止的。

trans-unit.source: Most QML applications will have a large amount of JavaScript code in them, in the form of dynamic functions, signal handlers, and property binding expressions. This is generally not a problem. Thanks to some optimizations in the QML engine, such as those done to the bindings compiler, it can (in some use-cases) be faster than calling a C++ function. However, care must be taken to ensure that unnecessary processing isn't triggered accidentally.
trans-unit.target: 大多数QML应用程序中会有大量的JavaScript代码,以动态函数、信号处理程序和属性绑定表达式的形式存在。这通常不是问题。多亏了QML引擎中的一些优化,比如对绑定编译器所做的优化,它可以(在某些使用情况下)比调用一个C++函数更快。然而,必须注意确保不会意外地触发不必要的处理。

trans-unit.source: Most QStyle draw functions take four arguments:

Most actions in an application are represented as items in menus or buttons in toolbars. However sometimes more complex widgets are necessary. For example a zoom action in a word processor may be realized using a QComboBox in a QToolBar, presenting a range of different zoom levels. QToolBar provides QToolBar::insertWidget() as convenience function for inserting a single widget. However if you want to implement an action that uses custom widgets for visualization in multiple containers then you have to subclass QWidgetAction.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序中的大多数操作都表示为菜单或工具栏中的按钮中的项目。但是，有时需要更复杂的小部件。例如，可以使用能够实现在一个字处理器的变焦动作QComboBox在一个在QToolBar，呈现一定范围的不同缩放级别的。在QToolBar提供在QToolBar :: insertWidget（）作为方便的函数用于插入单个部件。但是，如果要实现使用自定义窗口小部件在多个容器中进行可视化的操作，则必须将QWidgetAction子类化。

trans-unit.source: Most actions in an application are represented as items in menus or buttons in toolbars. However sometimes more complex widgets are necessary. For example a zoom action in a word processor may be realized using a QComboBox in a QToolBar, presenting a range of different zoom levels. QToolBar provides QToolBar::insertWidget() as convenience function for inserting a single widget. However if you want to implement an action that uses custom widgets for visualization in multiple containers then you have to subclass QWidgetAction.

Most algorithms take STL-style iterators as parameters. The algorithms are generic in the sense that they aren't bound to a specific iterator class; you can use them with any iterators that meet a certain set of requirements.
trans-unit.target: 大多数算法都将STL样式的迭代器作为参数。从某种意义上说，这些算法没有绑定到特定的迭代器类，因此它们是通用的。您可以将它们与满足一定条件的任何迭代器一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Most application code will not interface directly with a media service's controls, instead the QMediaObject which owns the service acts as an intermediary between one or more controls and the application.
trans-unit.target: 大多数应用程序代码不会直接与媒体服务的控件交互，而是拥有该服务的QMediaObject充当一个或多个控件与应用程序之间的中介。

trans-unit.source: Most applications depend on resources such as images and icons to provide a rich user experience. It can often be a challenge to make these resources available to the application regardless of the target OS. Most popular OS-es employ stricter security policies that restrict access to the file system, making it harder to load these resources. As an alternative, Qt offers its own resource system that is built into the application binary, enabling access to the application's resources regardless of the target OS.
trans-unit.target: 大多数应用程序依靠图像和图标等资源来提供丰富的用户体验。无论目标操作系统如何，使这些资源都可用于应用程序通常是一个挑战。大多数流行的OS-es都采用更严格的安全策略，这些策略限制了对文件系统的访问，从而使加载这些资源变得更加困难。作为替代方案，Qt提供了自己的资源系统，该资源系统内置于应用程序二进制文件中，无论目标操作系统是什么，都可以访问应用程序的资源。

trans-unit.source: Most applications that can browse the web, allow the user to input a URL in the form of a plain string. This string can be manually typed into a location bar, obtained from the clipboard, or passed in via command line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 大多数可以浏览网页的应用程序,都允许用户以普通字符串的形式输入一个URL。这个字符串可以手动输入到位置栏,从剪贴板获取,或者通过命令行参数传递。

trans-unit.source: Most applications will have at least one model feeding data to a view. There are some semantics which application developers need to be aware of, in order to achieve maximal performance.
trans-unit.target: 大多数应用程序将至少有一个模型将数据馈送到视图。为了实现最大的性能,应用程序开发人员需要了解一些语义。

trans-unit.target: 大多数应用程序将永远不需要用这个类做任何其他事情。该类提供的其他功能对那些在翻译文件上工作的应用程序很有用。

trans-unit.source: Most backends however do support QVideoRendererControl and therefore don't have the limitations listed above.

trans-unit.source: Most common uses for item data are covered by the standard roles defined in Qt::ItemDataRole. By supplying appropriate item data for each role, models can provide hints to views and delegates about how items should be presented to the user. Different kinds of views have the freedom to interpret or ignore this information as required. It is also possible to define additional roles for application-specific purposes.
trans-unit.target: Qt :: ItemDataRole中定义的标准角色涵盖了项目数据的最常见用法。通过为每个角色提供适当的项目数据，模型可以向视图和委托提供有关如何将项目呈现给用户的提示。不同类型的视图可以根据需要自由解释或忽略此信息。也可以为特定于应用程序的目的定义其他角色。

trans-unit.source: Most commonly, when presenting text in a user interface, the exact fonts used to render the characters is to some extent unknown. This can be the case for several reasons: For instance, the actual, physical fonts present on the target system could be unexpected to the developers, or the text could contain user selected styles, sizes or writing systems that are not supported by font chosen in the code.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的情况是,当在用户界面上显示文本时,在某种程度上不知道用于渲染字符的确切字体。造成这种情况的原因有很多。例如,目标系统上实际存在的物理字体可能出乎开发人员的意料,或者文本可能包含用户选择的样式、大小或书写系统,而代码中选择的字体不支持这些样式。

trans-unit.source: Most containers have the concept of a "current" item. The current item is specified via the currentIndex property, and can be accessed using the read-only currentItem property.
trans-unit.target: 大多数容器具有“当前”项目的概念。当前项目是通过currentIndex属性指定的，并且可以使用只读currentItem属性进行访问。

trans-unit.source: Most errors detected by QCborStreamReader during normal item parsing are not recoverable. The code using QCborStreamReader may opt to handle the data that was properly decoded or it can opt to discard the entire data.

Most event types have special classes, notably QResizeEvent, QPaintEvent, QMouseEvent, QKeyEvent, and QCloseEvent. Each class subclasses QEvent and adds event-specific functions. For example, QResizeEvent adds size() and oldSize() to enable widgets to discover how their dimensions have been changed.

trans-unit.source: Most platforms provide a tool for generating new UUIDs, e.g. uuidgen and guidgen. You can also use createUuid(). UUIDs generated by createUuid() are of the random type. Their QUuid::Version bits are set to QUuid::Random, and their QUuid::Variant bits are set to QUuid::DCE. The rest of the UUID is composed of random numbers. Theoretically, this means there is a small chance that a UUID generated by createUuid() will not be unique. But it is a very small chance.
trans-unit.target: 大多数平台都提供了用于生成新UUID的工具，例如 uuidgen 和 guidgen 。您也可以使用createUuid（）。createUuid（）生成的UUID 为随机类型。他们的QUuid :: Version位设置为QUuid :: Random，而他们的QUuid :: Variant位设置为QUuid :: DCE。UUID的其余部分由随机数组成。从理论上讲，这意味着由createUuid（）生成的UUID 很少是唯一的。但它是一个非常小的机会。

trans-unit.source: Most systems allow the user to define the systems default configuration. trans-unit.source: Most wizards have a linear structure, with page 1 followed by page 2 and so on until the last page. The Class Wizard example is such a wizard. With QWizard, linear wizards are created by instantiating the QWizardPages and inserting them using addPage(). By default, the pages are shown in the order in which they were added. For example:
trans-unit.target: 大多数向导具有线性结构，第1页紧随其后是第2页，依此类推，直到最后一页。的类向导实例是这样的向导。使用QWizard，可以通过实例化QWizardPage并使用addPage（）插入它们来创建线性向导。默认情况下，页面以添加顺序显示。例如：

trans-unit.source: Most wizards have a linear structure, with page 1 followed by page 2 and so on until the last page. The Class Wizard example is such a wizard. With QWizard, linear wizards are created by instantiating the QWizardPages and inserting them using addPage(). By default, the pages are shown in the order in which they were added. For example:
Mouse Events and Touch Event Synthesizing
trans-unit.target: 鼠标事件和触摸事件合成

trans-unit.source: Mouse and tablet event handling is also slightly special: only when the widget is enabled, event() will call the specialized handlers such as mousePressEvent(); otherwise it will discard the event.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标和平板电脑的事件处理也有些特殊：只有启用了小部件时，event（）才会调用专门的处理程序，例如mousePressEvent（）;。否则将丢弃该事件。

trans-unit.source: Mouse cursor with an arbitrary shape
trans-unit.target: 鼠标光标具有任意形状
鼠标进入小部件的边界（QEnterEvent）。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events are sent to editorEvent() even if they don't start editing of the item. This can, for instance, be useful if you wish to open a context menu when the right mouse button is pressed on an item.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标事件即使没有开始编辑项目,也会被发送到editorEvent()。例如,如果你想在一个项目上按下鼠标右键时打开一个上下文菜单,这就很有用。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events for series are reported asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 系列的鼠标事件是异步报告的。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events in the graphics view framework
trans-unit.target: 图形视图框架中的鼠标事件

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur when a mouse button is pressed and the ray traversing the view, originating from the mouse position intersects with one or more elements of the scene.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标事件发生在鼠标按钮被按下后,源于鼠标位置的穿越视图的光线与场景中的一个或多个元素相交时。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur when a mouse button is pressed or released inside a widget, or when the mouse cursor is moved.
trans-unit.target: 当在小组件中按下或释放鼠标按钮,或移动鼠标光标时,会发生鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur when a mouse cursor is moved into, out of, or within a widget, and if the widget has the Qt::WA_Hover attribute.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标光标移入，移出窗口小部件或在窗口小部件中移动时，并且窗口小部件具有Qt :: WA_Hover属性，就会发生鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events that are not explicitly handled by the title bar widget must be ignored by calling QMouseEvent::ignore(). These events then propagate to the QDockWidget parent, which handles them in the usual manner, moving when the title bar is dragged, docking and undocking when it is double-clicked, etc.
trans-unit.target: 标题栏小部件未显式处理的鼠标事件必须通过调用QMouseEvent :: ignore（）来忽略。然后，这些事件传播到QDockWidget父级，后者以通常的方式处理它们，拖动标题栏时移动，双击时停靠和取消停放，等等。
鼠标离开小组件的边界。

trans-unit.source: Mouse locking, which locks the mouse pointer to the web view and is typically used in games.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标锁定,将鼠标指针锁定在网页视图上,一般用于游戏中。

trans-unit.source: Mouse move events will occur only when a mouse button is pressed down, unless mouse tracking has been enabled with QWidget::setMouseTracking().
trans-unit.target: 仅当按下鼠标按钮时才会发生鼠标移动事件，除非已使用QWidget :: setMouseTracking（）启用了鼠标跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Mouse or touch input received on the primary view area. If secondary view is displayed when inputView becomes InputViewOnPrimary, secondary view is closed.
trans-unit.target: 在主视图区域上收到的鼠标或触摸输入。如果在inputView变为InputViewOnPrimary 时显示辅助视图，则将关闭辅助视图。

trans-unit.source: Mouse or touch input received on the secondary view area.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标或触摸输入到辅助视图区域。

trans-unit.source: Mouse or touch not on a view.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标或触摸不在一个视图。

trans-unit.source: Mouse press again (double click) in a graphics scene (QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent).
trans-unit.target: 在图形场景（QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent）中再次单击（双击）。

trans-unit.source: Mouse press in a graphics scene (QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent).
trans-unit.target: 在图形场景（QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent）中单击鼠标。

trans-unit.source: Mouse press, move, release and double click events, as well as mouse hover events, wheel events, and context menu events.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标按压、移动、释放和双击事件,以及鼠标悬停事件、滚轮事件和上下文菜单事件。

trans-unit.source: Mouse release in a graphics scene (QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent).
trans-unit.target: 在图形场景中释放鼠标（QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent）。

trans-unit.source: Mouse tracking in combobox drop-down lists.
trans-unit.target: 在组合框下拉列表中进行鼠标跟踪。
在弹出式菜单中进行鼠标跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Mouse wheel events occur when the mouse is rotated.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标轮事件发生在鼠标旋转时。

trans-unit.source: Mouse wheel events occur when the mouse wheel is rotated.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标轮事件发生在鼠标轮旋转时。

trans-unit.source: Mouse wheel rolled in a graphics scene (QGraphicsSceneWheelEvent).
trans-unit.target: 鼠标滚轮在图形场景（QGraphicsSceneWheelEvent）中滚动。

trans-unit.source: MouseArea is an invisible Item, but it has a visible property. When set to false, the mouse area becomes transparent to mouse events.
